room_title: Escape room "Sweet Dreams" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
review: Escaped in Time is fantastic! The staff was kind and thorough in their explanations of the entire escape room experience! Such a fun and unique way to bond with our team while also being challenged! My group of five played the Sweet Dreams room and were able to escape! I'll definitely be back!
